meanings.definition: To say or do something again.
meanings.sent1: I will rerepeat the instructions for you.
meanings.sent2: She likes to rerepeat her favorite song.
meanings.sent3: The parrot decided to rerepeat the funny phrase it heard.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to rerepeat in the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waves rerepeating against the shore was calming.

meanings.definition: To do or experience something again.
meanings.sent1: Please rerepeat the experiment to confirm the results.
meanings.sent2: He wanted to rerepeat the thrilling roller coaster ride.
meanings.sent3: The movie was so good that she wanted to rerepeat the experience.
meanings.sent4: The memories of childhood rerepeated in his mind like a movie reel.
meanings.sent5: The sweet taste of the dessert rerepeated on her taste buds.
